mapper.select: SELECT TMG_F_GET_ME_NAME ( TNAL_CMODIFIERUSERID, #{psDate,jdbcType=DATE}, 0, TNAL_CCUSTOMERID, TNAL_CCOMPANYID ) AS EMPNAME, TMG_F_GET_MGD ( TNAL_CNTFACTION, #{psDate,jdbcType=DATE}, TNAL_CCUSTOMERID, TNAL_CCOMPANYID, #{psLanguage} ) AS NTFACTIONNAME, TMG_F_GET_MGD ( TNAL_CAFT_STATUSFLG, #{psDate,jdbcType=DATE}, TNAL_CCUSTOMERID, TNAL_CCOMPANYID, #{psLanguage} ) AS STATUSNAME, TMG_F_GET_MGD ( TNAL_CAFT_APPROVAL_LEVEL,#{psDate,jdbcType=DATE}, TNAL_CCUSTOMERID, TNAL_CCOMPANYID, #{psLanguage} ) AS CAPPROVAL_LEVEL, TO_CHAR( TNAL_DMODIFIEDDATE, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi' ) AS TNAL_DMODIFIEDDATE, TNAL_CUPDATECCOMMENT FROM TMG_NTFACTIONLOG WHERE TNAL_CCUSTOMERID = #{psCustId} AND TNAL_CCOMPANYID = #{psCompCode} AND TNAL_CNTFNO = #{psNtfNo} ORDER BY TNAL_DMODIFIEDDATE
